name: Automate transactional emails from KlickTipp via Make Email
description:
This scenario listens for contact data sent from KlickTipp Outbound and automatically sends a personalized email via the Make Email app to the recipient. Key details — such as the customer’s name, company, or other custom fields — can be dynamically mapped into the email subject and body, allowing you to create professional, accurate, and branded messages. The workflow also saves the email’s HTML content and updates the contact’s email delivery status in KlickTipp, giving you clear visibility into which emails were successfully sent and which failed.

Perfect for online businesses, e-commerce stores, coaches, consultants, and service providers who want to send important updates, confirmations, or personalized messages instantly without manual intervention. By combining Make Email’s flexible sending options with KlickTipp’s contact management, this automation ensures recipients get timely information while keeping your database up to date.

This integration empowers you to send immediate messages, store the exact HTML content sent, track delivery outcomes, and trigger follow-up sequences in KlickTipp based on delivery status. With automated sending and tracking, you save time, reduce errors, and maintain a professional communication experience — while freeing yourself to focus on sales, customer service, and business growth.
